name: FA Beta Enhanced
description: Minor tweaks, bug fixes, and ad hider for the new FA beta theme.
additional_info:
Version 3.0 (October 15th, 2016)
- Support for newest beta theme

Version 2.0 (March 5th, 2016)
- Support for new beta update
- Just changed a few things for the update (the update is pretty solid otherwise)

Version 1.0.7 (March 1st, 2016)
- Fixed the new Block button

Version 1.0.6 (Jan 26th, 2016)
- Corrected image scrolling
 - Large horizontal images will now scroll independently of the page

Version 1.0.5 (Jan 24th, 2016)
- Fixed some misc. issues

Version 1.0.4 (Dec 21st, 2015) -
- Fixed rounded corners in notes

Version 1.0.3 (Dec 21st, 2015)
- First steps to fixing the mobile layout (buggy).

Version 1.0.2 (Dec 21st, 2015) -
- Tons of buttons fixed and tweaked
- Completely fixed all overflows
- Misc. bug fixes and style tweaks

Version 1.0.1 (Dec 20th, 2015) -
- Fixed FA's weird width on the stats page
- Fixed bugs
- Spaced journal page

Version 1.0 (Dec 20th, 2015) -
Release
